charges.charge_description: 21:843(b) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE, use of communication facility to facilitate narcotics distribtion (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCE: Impris for 37 mos, ct 1 of superseding info. One yr supv rel, ct 1s, under trmrs and conds (see back of J&;C) and participate in program for treatment of narc/alcohol addiction, pay fine imp by this sent and that remains unpaid at commencement of comm supv, comply w/rules/regs of INS, if deported not return to USA illegally and upon any reenty during period of supv report to nearest PO w/in 72 hrs. Purs to guidelines fines wvd, incl costs of impris and supv. Crt finds dft does not have ability to pay. Pay $50 S/A to US. Rem ct dism. Dft informed of right to appeal (1s)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: On government's motion, all remaining count/underlying indictment/ordered dismissed (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Impris for 188 mos on ea of ct 1 of indictment. 5 yrs supv release imp on ct 1 under usual terms and conds (see back of J&;C) and the following addit'l terms and conds, under direction of the PO: participate in a program for treatment of narc/alcohol addiction, comply w/rules/regs of INS, if deported not return to US illegally and upon any reentry during period of supv report to the nearest PO w/in 72 hrs. Purs to guidelines fines wvd, incl costs of impris and supv. Crt finds dft does not have ability to pay. Pay $50 S/A to US. Dft informed of right to appeal (1)
